parts.text:
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post includes a CMF number (CMF 11240002), which is typically associated with electoral campaign materials in Romania.  This strongly suggests the post is related to an electoral campaign.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post clearly refers to Gabriel Pană and Maria Gabriela Horga. While it doesn't explicitly state they are running for parliamentary elections, the presence of the CMF number and the image strongly suggest a connection to an electoral campaign. The image shows both individuals, with their titles (Primar and Senator) and the PNL logo.  This suggests they are candidates for local or national elections, and the image is likely part of their campaign material.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>The post is a paid Facebook advertisement, inherently designed to reach a wide audience.  The targeting data shows a reach of 5K-10K people across several locations in Giurgiu County, Romania. This clearly indicates an attempt to address a broad public, not just personal communication.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The objective of the post is to increase awareness and potentially support for Gabriel Pană and Maria Gabriela Horga. The use of professional photography, clear titles, and the PNL logo all point towards an intention to influence voters' choices. The paid nature of the advertisement further reinforces this objective. The image and text work together to promote the candidates and their affiliation with the PNL.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post does not present itself as journalistic content. It lacks any objective reporting, analysis, or opinion pieces. Instead, it directly promotes specific candidates, which is not consistent with journalistic standards.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The content is not a personal opinion; it's a clearly structured promotional piece for political candidates. The use of a CMF number, professional imagery, and paid advertising definitively rules out the possibility of this being a personal opinion.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1460906211256435</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all the criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It directly refers to candidates (Gabriel Pană and Maria Gabriela Horga), uses paid advertising to reach a wide audience, has a clear electoral objective (promoting the candidates), and is not journalistic in nature. The presence of the CMF number further strengthens this conclusion.  While the specific election isn't explicitly stated, the context strongly suggests it's related to an election, given the candidates' titles and the PNL logo.  The post's timing (after the parliamentary election period) is not specified in the provided data, but if it falls outside the legal campaign period, it would constitute a violation.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Gabriel Pană</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
  <candidate><name>Maria Gabriela Horga</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>PNL</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Cosmin Radoi, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei reclame electorale plătite pe Facebook (ID postare: 1460906211256435) după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024,  promovând candidații Gabriel Pană și Maria Gabriela Horga,  afiliați PNL, cu un buget de sub 100 RON,  ajungând la 5.000-10.000 de impresii,  prin intermediul imaginii care îi prezintă pe candidați cu titlurile lor (Primar și Senator) și sigla PNL,  având ca efect electoral creșterea vizibilității și a sprijinului pentru aceștia.  Reclama conține numărul CMF 11240002, indicând clar natura sa electorală.  Această acțiune constituie propagandă electorală interzisă după încheierea perioadei legale de campanie, conform articolului 98 t).  Datele de contact ale advertiserului sunt: cosmin.radoi@blueads.ro și +40726405495.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
